module.name: Call Statistics
module.changelog: *0.0.1b2* Fixed a bug in how calls to/from extension were counted in the Extensions Breakdown module. *0.0.1b1* Initial release of the module which contains the original module, Concurrent Calls v2.1.1 as well as the previously unreleased "Extensions Breakdown" module.
module.description: Graphs concurrent calls as well as calls made by extensions over a specified period of time.
